title: The Hillman Group 823704 Stainless Steel Oval Head Phillips Sheet Metal Screw, 10-Inch x 3-Inch, 50-Pack
features: Sheet Metal Screws Are Designed For Joining Thin Pieces Of Metal To Wood, Fiberglass Or Metal Primarily Through A Pre - Drilled
Great For General Repair Around The House
From The Brand Name: The Hillman Group
description: These sheet metal screws, or tapping screws, are highly versatile and are used to attached metal, wood, fiberglass and plastic. The sharp threads draw material together and ensure a secure hold. Sheet metal screws are fully threaded with a sharp point.
